@ghostly150 wrote:

i dont have a Class68_Sub20_Sub15 or loader. I know its a 525 client though. But still nothing’s working… I don’t know why. I got it to work a long time ago but I don’t remember what I did. Please help me. Ive tried client, client2, applet_sub1 with 0.0.0.0 127.0.0.1 localhost… nothing…

item.title: Error_Game_JS5connect? [525]
item.dc:creator: @_Ray ~_ Ray _~
item.description:
@_Ray wrote:

if its a z525 (517…leechers call it so) then go to loader

Class106.anInt1799 = 1;
Class75_Sub3.anInt3328 = 0;
Class13_Sub4.anInt2690 = 0;
Class1_Sub7.aBoolean2612 = true;
Class68_Sub13_Sub27.anInt3915 = 0;
Class68_Sub13_Sub34.anInt4008 = 0;
Class75_Sub2.aBoolean3314 = false;
Class68_Sub20_Sub15.ip = “Your Ip”;
Class26.aRSString_521 = Class68_Sub28_Sub2.aRSString_4556;
Class68_Sub13_Sub20.anInt3780 = 0;
client client1 = new client();
client1.method21(765, 503, 109, 27, “…::’########::…”, 508, 32 - -Class13_Sub4.anInt2690);
Class108.aFrame1832.setLocation(40, 40);

or at Class68_Sub20_Sub15 and then search for public static String ip and you will see something like public static String ip = “Your ip”; this add there your ip to some of this should work then.

Read full topic

item.title: Error_Game_JS5connect? [525]
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

i need help, i dont think my client works, ive changed the ip of 127.0.0.1 to my server in the Client.java, and in the Applet-Sub.java or w/e its called, then after than it says error…when im running the server? and i got the no-ip ready and everythin please help if u got an idea of whats wrong…here’s what i changed in the Files

Client.java

} else if (Class3.anInt174 != 1) { if (Class3.anInt174 == 2) { Class101.anInt1673 = 40000 + Class34.anInt609; Class98.anInt1607 = Class34.anInt609 + 50000; Class20.aString409 = "CANT SHOW SERVER IP";
i put the "Cant show server" because then my topic will be removed for advertising.

Applet_sub1.java (AM I SUPPOSED TO CHANGE THIS??? if so, post how it shoud look please

anInt28++; String string = getDocumentBase().getHost().toLowerCase(); if (string.equals("jagex.com") || string.endsWith(".jagex.com")) return true; if (string.equals("runescape.com") || string.endsWith(".runescape.com")) return true; if (string.endsWith("127.0.0.1")) return true;

What do i need to do in the applet sub…which do i change? runescape.com or 127.0.0.1?

Read full topic
